item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Pierre Bouillon ðŸ‘‹ I’m a young french software engineer, passionate about new technologies, programming and sharing what I managed to learn along the way. I’m mostly into programming and software architecture, also curious about IoT and functional programming. I love making things work, usually using Python or C#, mostly fueled with optimism, enthusiasm and coffee. â˜• You can find more about my projects on my GitHub !
